mapper.select:
select * from( select row_number() over(order by emp_num asc) as rn,
from employees where emp_num like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or emp_id like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or emp_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ) as emp where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow};
